rules_text:
Indestructible
[i]Night Tide[/i] – Whenever Dheginsea, Tellius Hero enters or attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature you don't control, then for each counter put on a creature this way, put that many +1/+1 counters onto Dheginsea.
[i]Ashera's Chosen – [/i]Dheginsea can't be blocked by creatures with lesser power.
[i]Caller of Kings[/i] – The first legendary creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.
